code: import{ADD_POST,FORBIDDEN_WORDS}from'../actions/action_types';var forbiddenWords=["middleware"];export function forbiddenWordsMiddleware(_ref){var dispatch=_ref.dispatch;return function(next){return function(action){if(action.type===ADD_POST){var foundWord=forbiddenWords.filter(function(word){return action.payload.title.includes(word);});console.log('Forbidden Word: ',foundWord);if(foundWord.length){return dispatch({type:FORBIDDEN_WORDS});}}return next(action);};};}
